name: Green Climate World
description: Green Climate world is a project aiming to improve the life on our planet. The core of the project is the WGC Token. The WGC token is a blockchain based cryptocurrency and also a ledger. All logs will be secure on the blockchain with no possibility for any kind of tempering or erasing by anyone. Our main goal is recording atmospheric data to our blockchain and planting trees.In order to reach our goal we will take a small percent of the value of the the WGC token and put it toward planting trees.
